intro.description: Our prices let you give flowers for no reason at all!

advantages.title: Advantages of flower
advantages.info: Every day we learn and experiment, creating new floral arrangements. We strive to be a little better today than we were yesterday, to make our customers happy.

florists.title: Talented florists
florists.text: Our florists have years of experience and certificates confirming their expertise

fresh.title: Always fresh flowers
fresh.text: Our bouquets will delight you for at least a week and a half

prices.title: Lowest prices in the city
prices.text: Our flower prices are on average 20% lower than in any other flower shop

about-us.title: Popular Products
about-us.hero: Flower — give a smile to someone you love
about-us.block1: Sometimes words aren’t enough to express all the love. Only an elegant bouquet can win the heart of a lovely lady and say all the tender words for you. Flowers carry beauty and are a universal gift for any occasion.
about-us.block2: Flower is an online flower shop full of freshness, scents, and beauty — made for such special moments. We’re the most trusted company in the city, known for high quality and great service. We always stay in trend, move forward, and use only stylish and elegant packaging that complements our fresh, fragrant bouquets. A gift like this brings sparkle to a girl’s eyes and fills the world with a radiant smile.
about-us.block3: We guarantee that every bouquet will leave you impressed and become a perfect decoration for any occasion. We put a piece of our soul into each arrangement — that’s why our customers value and choose us. One of our principles is affordable flowers, so you can make a gift anytime. Same-day delivery means you can enjoy fragrant blossoms at a great price today.
about-us.block4: You can place an order online in just a few clicks, and within hours, our floral compositions will bring joy to someone — and you’ll see gratitude and love in her eyes.Even if you’re not in town but want to make your loved one happy, the perfect option is to order by phone or place your order online.
about-us.block6: Our flower shop offers a vibrant celebration of color, emotion, and original ideas. For fans of classics, we have a refined variety of roses. If you love tenderness and youthfulness, choose tulip bouquets — pink, yellow, red — each is special in its own way. Peonies are always a win: charming in their softness and grace. Want to surprise someone? Then chrysanthemums and hydrangeas are the answer. Gift daisies when you want to express tender feelings — it’s no coincidence they’re used for love divination. The delicate scent of eustoma reminds of spring sunshine and warms even a rainy day.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.note: Flower delivery around the city, wedding and event decoration.
